sk.tsystems.forum.junittests

Class TopicServicesTests

  • java.lang.Object
    • sk.tsystems.forum.junittests.TopicServicesTests

  • public class TopicServicesTests
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains JUnit Tests which check if all methods in TopicServices work correctly.
    Author:
    karolklescinsky

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private CreatingTestingSamples sample 
      private TopicServices topicServices 
      private UserServices userServices 
      private UsersTopicsServices usersTopicsServices

      TopicServicesTests() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void createTesterUserAndTestingTopic()
      This method is called before each test.
      void doesMethodAddTopicToDatabaseWork()
      Checks if specific topic was created earlier under "@Before" annotation.
      void doesMethodGetPresentTopicWork()
      Checks if topic "testing Topic" is in database
      void doesMethodGetTopicIDWork()
      Checks two topicsID of type integer, one stored as 0 and another stored in database, asserting that they do not equal.
      void doesMethodGetTopicWork()
      Checks two topics of type String, one stored as String in class CreatingTestingSamples and another stored in database.
      void doesMethodPrintTopicsWork()
      prints topics from database to listOfTestedTopics.
      void doesMethodRemoveSubscriberWork()
      Checks the size of the list of users for specified topic, one before calling methods setSubscriber and removeSubscriber, another one after calling these methods.
      void doesMethodRemoveTopicWork()
      Checks if topic "Bonus" is in table after calling removeTopic method.
      void doesMethodSetSubscriberWork()
      Checks the size of the list of users for specified topic, one before calling method setSubscriber and another one after calling method setSubscriber.
      void doesMethodUpdateTopicWork()
      Checks two visibilities, one before calling method updateTopic and another one after calling method updateTopic.
      void dropUser()
      This method is called after each test.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TopicServicesTests

        public TopicServicesTests()

    • Method Detail

      • createTesterUserAndTestingTopic

        public void createTesterUserAndTestingTopic()
        This method is called before each test. Calls method createTestedUser which adds testedUser into the database. Calls method createTestedTopic which adds testedTopic into the database.

      • dropUser

        public void dropUser()
        This method is called after each test. Calls method removeTopic which drops testedTopic from database. Calls method dropUser which drops testedUser from database.

      • doesMethodAddTopicToDatabaseWork

        public void doesMethodAddTopicToDatabaseWork()
        Checks if specific topic was created earlier under "@Before" annotation. Checks if value after calling getTopic method is not null.

      • doesMethodPrintTopicsWork

        public void doesMethodPrintTopicsWork()
        prints topics from database to listOfTestedTopics. Secondly, adds one more topic to database and prints to listOfTestedTopics1. Finally, compares lists, asserting that those do not equal.

      • doesMethodGetTopicIDWork

        public void doesMethodGetTopicIDWork()
        Checks two topicsID of type integer, one stored as 0 and another stored in database, asserting that they do not equal.

      • doesMethodGetTopicWork

        public void doesMethodGetTopicWork()
        Checks two topics of type String, one stored as String in class CreatingTestingSamples and another stored in database.

      • doesMethodGetPresentTopicWork

        public void doesMethodGetPresentTopicWork()
        Checks if topic "testing Topic" is in database

      • doesMethodRemoveTopicWork

        public void doesMethodRemoveTopicWork()
        Checks if topic "Bonus" is in table after calling removeTopic method. Expecting null.

      • doesMethodUpdateTopicWork

        public void doesMethodUpdateTopicWork()
        Checks two visibilities, one before calling method updateTopic and another one after calling method updateTopic. Values should change from "private" to "public".

      • doesMethodSetSubscriberWork

        public void doesMethodSetSubscriberWork()
        Checks the size of the list of users for specified topic, one before calling method setSubscriber and another one after calling method setSubscriber. Values should not equal when compared.

      • doesMethodRemoveSubscriberWork

        public void doesMethodRemoveSubscriberWork()
        Checks the size of the list of users for specified topic, one before calling methods setSubscriber and removeSubscriber, another one after calling these methods. Values should be equal when compared.
